summary: This is an email from Nicole Simmons to Judge Nathan regarding the U.S. v. Maxwell case, transmitting a joint letter concerning Rule 412 and 702 motions and a hearing date. It includes attachments related to defense experts and a Daubert hearing.

events.title: Email Transmission re: Maxwell Case Motions
events.description: Nicole Simmons sends an email to Judge Nathan transmitting a joint letter concerning Rule 412 and 702 motions and a proposed hearing date in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 3, 2021, concerning the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The correspondence is a joint letter from the parties regarding Rule 412 and 702 motions and a proposed hearing date.
Attachments include a joint letter about defense experts and a Daubert hearing, and an exhibit related to an expert notice with proposed redactions.
The email is sent by attorney Nicole Simmons from the law firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C.
